story: Welcome! We're your hosts Andre, Diego, Jordan, and Julian, and we're thrilled you've joined us. For the past decade, our club has been organizing soccer meetups and tournaments in the West Loop and Chicago South Side, aiming to provide the best outdoors soccer pick up experience.
events: Whether you're an experienced player or just want to have fun playing soccer with new friends, we welcome you to join us. Jump into co-ed futsal and soccer pick-up games to show off your skills or pick up some new ones. While there is a small fee for certain events, know that your contributions help improve our gatherings. It’s more than just playing—it’s about building community, personal growth, and creating lasting memories.
